body.p: This section presents the Feedback-Enabled WebHelp systems support.

has the ability to transform DocBook documents into Feedback-Enabled WebHelp systems. The Feedback system allows you to view discussion threads in a tree-like representation, reply to already posted comments and use stylized comments.
allows you to publish DocBook 4 documents into a WebHelp with Feedback format which provides both Table of Contents and advanced search capabilities.
For further information about all the DocBook transformation parameters, go to http://docbook.sourceforge.net/release/xsl/current/doc/fo/index.html.
